1.0.0.en: Added support for ZigBee and Z-Wave devices.

2.0.0.en: (1) Support Homey V5.0. (2) Added support for the following devices: S24021, S32053, S32055, S32056, S57003.

2.0.2.en: (1) Support Homey V5.0. (2) Added support for the following devices: S24021, S32053, S32055, S32056, S57003.

2.0.3.en: Corrected the pictures of some devices and updated the names of some devices.

2.0.4.en: 1) Support Homey V5.0. 2) Added support for the following devices: S24021, S32053, S32054, S32055, S32056, S57003, S57007, S57018.

2.0.5.en: 1) Support Homey V5.0. 2) Added support for the following devices: S24021, S32053, S32054, S32055, S32056, S57001, S57003, S57005, S57006, S57007, S57018.

2.0.6.en: 1) Support Homey V5.0. 2) Added support for the following devices: S24015, S24021, S32053, S32054, S32055, S32056, S57001, S57003, S57005, S57006, S57007, S57018.

2.0.7.en: 1) Support Homey V5.0. 2) Added support for the following devices: S24015, S24021, S32053, S32054, S32055, S32056, S57001, S57003, S57005, S57006, S57007, S57009, S57018.

2.1.0.en: Added state report for ZigBee Light.

2.1.1.en: Added measure power, meter power for S24019.

2.1.2.en: Fix an issue that S24019 does not work after the update.

2.1.4.en: Add support for S32050, S32051, S32052

2.2.6.en: Support cloud, bug fixes and improvements.

2.2.9.en: Fixes an issue that the S24013 sometimes crashes.

2.2.12.en: Update the images of S24013, S24015.
